name: Escape from Stank
overview: Enhanced and re-released by The New Dimension in 2003 and also released as part of GO64! 2003/10 and GO64! 2004/02. Stranded in Stank, it is up to you to solve puzzles and escape this deadly, putrid planet before you meet your peril. Using text commands will help you go directions. Explore different rooms to find useful objects, but watch out for various hazards that can possibly kill you.
